topic.title: Sample Code
topic.shortdesc: The Go SDK now lets you create users, assign them roles and associated privileges, and remove them from the system.

section.title: User-Management APIs
section.p: Users who have been assigned the Admin role for the cluster are able to create, edit, and remove users. The Go SDK provides APIs to support these activities. A high-level summary of the APIs can be found in User-Management.

section.title: Go User-Management Example
section.p: The following code-example demonstrates how the user-management APIs can be used. It assumes that Couchbase Server is established on localhost; that the Full Administrator username and password are Administrator and password respectively; and that the travel-sample bucket is installed. For information on installing the travel-sample bucket, see Install Sample Buckets.
